sources.description:
12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Bela Lugosi, Malcolm McGregor, Viva Tattersall
Directed by: Colbert Clark & Albert Herman
 An underworld mastermind known only as "The Whispering Shadow" uses radio waves and an army of henchmen to control a powerful criminal empire. 
üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:08     CHAPTER 1: The Master Magician
31:13     CHAPTER 2: The Collapsing Room
49:40     CHAPTER 3: The All-seeing Eye
1:07:39  CHAPTER 4: The Shadow Strikes
1:25:14  CHAPTER 5: Wanted for Murder
1:43:16  CHAPTER 6: The Man Who Was Czar
2:02:10  CHAPTER 7: The Double Doom
2:19:48  CHAPTER 8: The Red Circle
2:37:32  CHAPTER 9: The Fatal Secret
2:54:40  CHAPTER 10: The Death Warrant
3:13:49  CHAPTER 11: The Trap
3:31:01  CHAPTER 12: King of the World

sources.title: The Whispering Shadow (1933) Bela Lugosi | Action, Crime, Horror
sources.description:
A mysterious criminal known as The Whispering Shadow commits crimes by means of a gang he controls by television and radio rays. Jack Norton, whose brother was murdered by The Whispering Shadow, suspects that the eerie Professor Strang - whose ghostly wax museum contains figures far too lifelike - may be involved in the crimes.

Original title: The Whispering Shadow (1933)


Directors: Colbert Clark, Albert Herman
Writers: Barney A. Sarecky, George Morgan, Norman S. Hall, 
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Viva Tattersall, Malcolm McGregor
Genres:¬†Classics, Action, Crime, Horror

00:00 Full length movie.
00:10 Mysterious criminal organization targets transport company, leading to deadly encounters and a criminologist's investigation.
12:00 Mysterious attacks at a transport company lead to suspicions and a visit to a magician's waxwork museum.
21:52 A mysterious criminal, Whispering Shadow, causes chaos and suspicion as detective Raymond tries to capture them.
31:32 Mysterious events unfold as individuals fight over a key and jewels, leading to a deadly confrontation.
43:53 Mysterious murder investigation unfolds with hidden agendas and betrayals.
55:24 Mystery unfolds as identities are revealed and a death ray machine is discovered.
1:00:11 A sinister mastermind reveals his deadly plan to become the most powerful man in the world.
